name: Raizi
text:
Hello, [Player].
You're quite early, aren't you?
Come on, over here. How about a drink first?

name: Raizi
text:
Well then, cheers... let's see.
Hehe, to you, who rushed here in a hurry at my sudden call.

name: Raizi
text:
...How did I notice, you asked?
There are several reasons, but let's see—

name: Raizi
text:
Your slightly disheveled hair, your breathing.
And above all, because you opened the door
and immediately looked for me.

name: Raizi
text:
...Oh, my apologies.
I'm not teasing you, so please don't take it the wrong way.

name: Raizi
text:
More importantly, since we've reunited like this,
how about a match after a long time?
After all, today is—

name: Raizi
text:
Hmph, haha, this is a surprise!
I can't believe my hand of cards
is the same as yours!

name: Raizi
text:
Yes, it's Valentine's Day.
Of course, I've prepared something too.
However, let's see—

name: Raizi
text:
It wouldn't be fun to just give this as is,
so how about we have a match?

name: Raizi
text: If you win, this chocolate will come with a small bonus reward.

name: Raizi
text:
And even if I win,
I will still give this to you.
—How about it, not a bad deal, right?
To [Player]'s nod, Raizi took out a coin from his pocket and slowly showed them both sides.

name: Raizi
text:
Let's decide the match simply with this.
Come on, choose your preference, heads or tails.

name: Raizi
text:
...OK, you chose that side.
No hard feelings, and it doesn't matter which side comes up.
Nodding at [Player]'s words, Raizi's flicked coin spun in the air.
The coin soon was drawn into Raizi's hand—

name: Raizi
text:
Congratulations, you win.
Hmph, the goddess of fortune seems to have smiled upon your wonderful gift.

name: Raizi
text:
...Now, to you, who defeated this gambler,
I shall give a small reward.

Saying that with a faint smile,
Raizi placed a hand on [Player]'s chin and gently pulled them closer.

name: Raizi
text: A kiss for the winner, as is the custom, isn't it?

And then, something pleasantly warm and soft brushed
against the surprised [Player]'s lips.

name: Raizi
text:
Come on, how about another round?
After all, the night is still young.
